Package com.immersion.uhl

Interface Summary
EffectHandle Encapsulates an effect handle.
 

Class Summary
Device Encapsulates a device handle representing an open device.
ImmVibe Defines general constants and methods.
IVTBuffer Stores IVT data.
IVTElement Base class for elements of a Timeline effect in an IVT buffer.
IVTMagSweepElement Represents a MagSweep effect within a Timeline effect in an IVT buffer.
IVTPeriodicElement Represents a Periodic effect within a Timeline effect in an IVT buffer.
IVTRepeatElement Represents a Repeat element within a Timeline effect in an IVT buffer.
IVTWaveformElement Represents a Waveform effect within a Timeline effect in an IVT buffer.
Launcher Provides a simple interface to play built-in effects.
MagSweepEffectDefinition Encapsulates the parameters of a MagSweep effect.
PeriodicEffectDefinition Encapsulates the parameters of a Periodic effect.
WaveformEffectDefinition Encapsulates the parameters of a Waveform effect.
